entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
